BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO HEM_COMPLAINT_REQ(GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, NUM_COMPLAIN_NO, NUM_DEPARTMENT_ID, NUM_EQUIP_BRAND_ID, STR_EQUIP_SL_NO, STR_COMPLAINANT_ID, DT_BREAKDOWN_DATE, STR_BREAKDOWN_TIME, STR_COMPL_NATURE_ID, STR_COMPLAINT_DESC, STR_COMPLAINT_STATUS, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE HEM_COMPLAINT_REQ SET STR_COMPLAINANT_ID=?, DT_BREAKDOWN_DATE=?, STR_BREAKDOWN_TIME=?, STR_COMPL_NATURE_ID=?, STR_COMPLAINT_DESC=?, STR_COMPLAINT_STATUS=?, GNUM_ISVALID=?, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND NUM_COMPLAIN_NO=?
UPDATE HEM_COMPLAINT_REQ SET GNUM_ISVALID=0,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE NUM_COMPLAIN_NO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE HEM_PROBLEM_IDENTIFIED_MAP SET GNUM_ISVALID=0,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE NUM_COMPLAIN_NO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND STR_PRBLM_BY='C'

INSERT INTO HEM_PROBLEM_IDENTIFIED_MAP(GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,NUM_SL_NO, NUM_COMPLAIN_NO, NUM_COMPO_BRAND_ID, STR_COMPO_SL_NO, STR_PRBLM_IDENTIFIED, STR_PRBLM_BY, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
DELETE FROM HEM_PROBLEM_IDENTIFIED_MAP WHERE NUM_COMPLAIN_NO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO HEM_PROBLEM_IDENTIFIED_MAP(GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,NUM_SL_NO, NUM_COMPLAIN_NO, NUM_COMPO_BRAND_ID, STR_COMPO_SL_NO, STR_PRBLM_IDENTIFIED, STR_PRBLM_BY, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
